Package pkgMain

Class View

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.View
public class View
extends java.lang.Object
View class from MVC design pattern
Author:
Aidan Chao, Nicholas Cutrona, Caleb Davis, Joey Loporto, Tommy Cheung

    • setSummaryScreen

      public void setSummaryScreen​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Plant> plantDataList, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<pkgMain.Coordinates>> plants, java.lang.String name, int budget, int lepSupported)
      Sets up the summary screen.
      Parameters:
      plantDataList - HashMap-String, Plant- list of plant data
      plants - HashMap-String, ArrayList-Coordinates-- list of plants and their coordinates on the garden
      name - String name of the garden
      budget - int budget for the garden
      lepSupported - int total leps supported by garden

    • plantDragDropping

      public double[] plantDragDropping​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<pkgMain.Coordinates>> plantsInGarden, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Plant> plantList, int width)
      Handles dragging and dropping plants in the garden
      Parameters:
      event - DragEvent mouse dragging event
      plantsInGarden - HashMap-String, ArrayList-Coordinates-- list of plants in the garden and their position
      plantList - HashMap-String, Plant- list of available plants
      width - int width of the garden
      Returns:
      double[] new plant location

    • isEmptySpace

      public boolean isEmptySpace​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<pkgMain.Coordinates>> plants, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Plant> plantList, java.lang.String plant, int gardenWidth, double x, double y)
      Checks to see if there is empty space in garden to place the plant when the user drags it into the garden.
      Parameters:
      plants - HashMap-String, ArrayList-Coordinates-- plants in the garden and their location
      plantList - HashMap-String, Plant- of available plants
      plant - String plant being dragged
      gardenWidth - int width of the garden
      x - int x position of dragged plant
      y - int y position of dragged plant
      Returns:
      boolean true if there is space for the plant, false if not

      plantWidth - int width of plant
      Returns:
